title: Joash Crowned King
summary: Jehoiada the priest leads a revolt, crowns young Joash king, and removes Athaliah from power. The people rejoice, the covenant is renewed, and the temple of Baal is destroyed.

faq.question: Who led the restoration of rightful rule?
What happened to Athaliah?
faq.answer: She was executed at the command of the leaders and priests.
